review: The Fire TV Stick is Awesome!
author: Lesley Snow

review: I waited for 6 weeks to get this thing after X-mas, what a disappointment.  Even with a strong signal, picture always buffering, jumping, pausing...no fun to watch
author: The ManLamb

review: Very easy to "install". Works perfect and just as expected!
author: Kelly Lair

review: I am very pleased with this device.  Even though I love watching programs on my Kindle, I watch more movies and shows with this product - more even than I watch on my the television cable service.  It is wonderful to be able to watch series from pilot to end in my recliner rather than at the computer. Now I wish for Prime to provide more of Amazon's offerings.  It would be unfortunate if at the end of my first year of Prime I did not renew because there were not enough new shows and movies available. Thank you, Amazon.
author: LYNN MAYCROFT

review: Very good product I enjoy it a lot
author: Lee Capistran

review: Nice item, easy to use and install.
author: Z

review: We love love love the fire stick. Spend way too much time in front if the tv now!
author: Renee Howell

review: without Prime you pay for show that are free on hulu and netflex
author: Michael Bland

review: Easy to use, great phone app available for free. Awesome that it comes loaded with your prime account if you have one. I ordered a 2nd one for the bedroom tv a week after buying the 1st one.
author: Jose
